issue.title: Multiple DRCSim issues, including p3d and Camera plugin missing includes 2.5, and 2.6.1

content.raw:
None of the console output provided here should cause any problems.  We're working right now on cleaning up that output, so that users aren't distracted by errors or warnings for conditions that are expected.

When you say that the simulator "barely runs," what do you mean?  Depending on your internet connection, startup can take tens of seconds if models need to be downloaded from the online model database.  Once it's running, what's your real-time factor?  You can see this in the GUI, in the "Real Time Factor" text box at the bottom, or you can run the `gzstats` tool at the command line.

I'm guessing that you have a very low real-time factor, perhaps caused by software rendering due to an unsupported GPU.
content.html:
None of the console output provided here should cause any problems. We're working right now on cleaning up that output, so that users aren't distracted by errors or warnings for conditions that are expected.

When you say that the simulator "barely runs," what do you mean? Depending on your internet connection, startup can take tens of seconds if models need to be downloaded from the online model database. Once it's running, what's your real-time factor? You can see this in the GUI, in the "Real Time Factor" text box at the bottom, or you can run the gzstats tool at the command line.

I'm guessing that you have a very low real-time factor, perhaps caused by software rendering due to an unsupported GPU.
